numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that there are more dots at the top of the line.
2. I notice that there are more countries in the list.
3. I wonder why there are fewer countries in the list at the bottom.
6. I hope that Earth will be a better place to live.
7. The graph is about a percentage of young people.
8. The graph is about a percentage of older people.
9. The graph shows what percentage of young people think that the world is getting better.
10. The graph shows what percentage of older people think that the world is getting better.
11. The title is: Is the Earth getting better?
